class.name: HltSelRepRBStdInfo
class.author: Tomasz Skwarnicki
class.desc: Manages the RawBank::HltSelReports Std Info sub-bank. The first word contains number of objects stored (less significant short) and allocated size of the sub-bank in words (more significant short). The rest consists of two sectors: number of words per object (8-bits), and numerical words (32-bits). Numerical info must be passed as unsigned int (even if it is a float) to allow for possible commpression. The one may be padded to start a new sector at a full word. Info can only be read and stored sequencially.

attribute.name: location
attribute.desc: Location of the subbank body in the program memory

attribute.name: floatLoc
attribute.desc: location of the first float word inside the bank

constructor.desc: takes pointer to the memory location of the subbank body as input
